title: Deploy Glorious Cyber School to Production

requirements.summary: Deploy the application to the Internet Computer mainnet with a permanent public URL, ensuring all frontend pages and features are accessible in production
acceptanceCriteria: The application is deployed to the Internet Computer mainnet
A permanent, publicly accessible URL is generated
All frontend pages (Home, Courses, Course Details, About, Enrollment, Fee Payment, Dashboard) are accessible
Backend canister is deployed and accessible to the frontend
All course data (Mathematics, Science, English, Hindi, Social Studies) is available in production
Internet Identity authentication works in production
Enrollment and payment features are functional in production

file_operations.description: Verify that the backend canister ID configuration correctly points to the production mainnet canister after deployment, ensuring the actor initialization uses the correct network settings for production environment
Ensure Internet Identity authentication is configured for production mainnet with correct identity provider URL and derivation origin settings for the deployed canister

Verify all route configurations (Home, Courses, CourseDetail, Dashboard, About, Enrollment, FeePayment) are properly set up and will function correctly in the production deployment with the mainnet canister URL structure
Ensure the HTML entry point correctly references production asset paths and verify that the title and meta tags are production-ready for the deployed application

Verify that the home page hero section with frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner.dim_1920x600.png and featured courses display correctly in production with proper image loading from the deployed canister

Ensure all course subject icons (frontend/public/assets/generated/math-icon.dim_128x128.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/science-icon.dim_128x128.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/english-icon.dim_128x128.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/hindi-icon.dim_128x128.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/social-studies-icon.dim_128x128.png) are correctly referenced and load properly in the production deployment

Verify that the enrollment page with frontend/public/assets/generated/enrollment-hero.dim_800x400.png displays correctly and that enrollment submission functions properly against the production backend canister

Ensure the fee payment page with frontend/public/assets/generated/fee-payment-icon.dim_128x128.png functions correctly in production and that payment initiation and completion workflows work with the deployed backend
Verify that the header navigation with frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.dim_256x256.png displays correctly and that all navigation links route properly in the production deployment
Ensure the user dashboard correctly fetches and displays enrollment records and payment history from the production backend canister with proper authentication
Verify URL parameter handling and routing utilities work correctly with the production canister URL structure and that sessionStorage operations function properly in the deployed environment
Ensure all global styles, theme configurations, and Tailwind CSS custom properties render correctly in production without any bundling or minification issues
